archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Arkitekturuviklingen (vendor-neutral)
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation:
Phase B, C and D:
Common objective: * develop the Target Business, Data, Application and Technology Architecture * Identify candidate Architecture Roadmap components based upon gaps between Baseline and Target Architectures
Common steps: * Developing a Baseline Description, if applicable * Developing a Target Description * Perform Gap Analysis * Define Candidate Roadmap Components * Create Architecture Definition Documnet & Archiceture Requriements Specification * Conduct Formal Stakeholder Review
